description: This file defines constants for routing and API endpoint paths in the Flutter frontend application, serving as a centralized configuration for navigation and network requests.

classes.name: Routes
classes.description: Contains static route path constants for app navigation.

classes.name: ApiPaths
classes.description: Contains static constants and functions defining API endpoint paths.

methods.name: enroll
methods.description: Constructs the API path for enrolling in a class with the specified class ID.

methods.name: sessions
methods.description: Constructs the API path for fetching sessions of a specific class.

methods.name: sessionMark
methods.description: Constructs the API path for marking a session with the given session ID.

methods.name: sessionAttendance
methods.description: Constructs the API path for attendance of a specific session.
